title: What are those black, glass things attached to the ceiling on top of the platform in each classroom in EC campus?
content: Every classroom in this college has a glass thing with a green light, attached to the ceiling on top of the platform. Is that a camera? It doesn't look like a typical one. Or is it a smoke detector?

comments.body: I graduated 2019, but if I'm not wrong those are IR receivers for the projector remote.

Do you mean [this?](https://imgur.com/a/OXg4FG1)

If so, that is the receiver for the long wireless mics worn by the professors used for the Impartus videos.
Yes, that's what I'm talking about. Thanks!
So, there aren't any cameras in classrooms?

Student-facing? None.  

Professor-facing? *ye*

Enjoy Life @ PES.
Are these cameras on and recording all the time? Or just recording during classes?
All the time (you can see it, the light blinks), but they're manually viewed and sorted by Impartus.
Wait, does impartus still do that? Since we use ms teams now?
No idea. This was the case the last time I stepped foot in there. Graduating next month so I wish I could be more accurate ðŸ˜…
Ahh okay. Thanks for your help! :)
